When read the currently active setting is returned, not regarding any cached values.

mGuardStealthManageNetmask.description: The management IP netmask of this system in stealth mode When set, this value is internally cached inside the agent until it is explicitly activated by writing the mGuardStealthManageActivate object. mGuardStealthManageActivate.description: Button to activate the stealth management IP configuration. When read and one or more of the above mentioned objects have been cached, valuescached(2) is returned, not regarding whether the cached valued and the current value are different.
